<S%H834>Wherein<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>granted<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H6950>gather<s%> themselves together, and to <S%H5975>stand<s%> for their <S%H5315>life,<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy,<s%> to slay <S%H2026><s%>and to cause to <S%H6>perish,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2428>power<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H4082>province<s%> that would <S%H6696>assault<s%> them, both <S%H2945>little<s%> ones and <S%H802>women,<s%> and to take the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of them for a <S%H962>prey,<s%>
